create.sql: create table sp_posts_questions (RecordID int auto_increment primary key, PostID int, TypeID int, index (PostID))

field.name: PostID

select.sql: select s.*,p.Name_$lang; as Post, q.Name_$lang; as Theme from sp_posts_questions s left outer join ut_post_types p on (p.TypeID=s.PostID) left outer join sp_question_types q on (q.TypeID=s.TypeID)
